synthesis_conditions.equipment: Vials with syringe needles for slow solvent evaporation
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Guest soaking was carried out at room temperature for the first five vials and at 50 degrees Celsius for the remaining five vials.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: In-house X-ray diffractometer with Cu Ka radiation
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Numerical absorption correction method was used for strong absorption effects correction.

synthesis_conditions.step: Guest soaking optimization and data collection
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Similar optimization experiments with clicked elatenyne (4) for the guest soaking process followed by data collection and structure refinement.
